thread.title: Rain related accidents cause traffic across UAE
thread.title_full: Rain related accidents cause traffic across UAE

title: Rain related accidents cause traffic across UAE
text: Rain related accidents cause traffic across UAE Web Team   | Last updated on February 14, 2017 at 09.23 am Share Vote Multiple accidents have taken place during the morning rush hours. With the unexpected rains this morning, came heavy traffic as minor accidents were reported in the city. The Dubai-Sharjah road is blocked with office-goers taking their route to offices in Dubai. Watch out for slippery roads leading to accidents today. There is slow moving traffic on Financial Centre road in Dubai and multiple accidents have taken place, as reported by traffficdxb. Multiple accidents on #E311 , #SMBZR opp City Centre Meaisem & DPC to Jebel Ali causing heavy tail-backs #Dubai #DubaiTraffic #TrafficUpdates pic.twitter.com/kdLwSLv5Ra Minutes back, an accident took place on E44 Al Khail road before Dubai Mall. Accident on E44 Al Khail Rd before #Dubai Mall exit towards Business Bay Bridge. pic.twitter.com/pSsQkh4QDY Watch out if you are taking the road toward Sheikh Zayed Road intersection as an accident on D63 Umm Sequim road has taken place. Accident on D63 Umm Sequim Rd just before #SZR intersection. Please drive with caution ?. pic.twitter.com/DHufABM9qA
